languages.text: "А ишо говорят, в этих лесах бабу с рогами видели..." {n}Распаленный редкой возможностью пересказать незнаком{mf|цу|ке} все известные ему байки, старик внезапно вспоминает, кто перед ним, и давится так и не расказанной историей.{/n}

"And some blokes say they saw a woman with horns in these woods—" {n}Despite his excitement at the rare opportunity to tell every possible tall tale he knows to a stranger, the old man suddenly remembers who is standing before him and chokes on his unfinished story.{/n}
languages.original_text: "А ишо говорят, в этих лесах бабу с рогами видели..." {n}Распаленный редкой возможностью пересказать незнаком{mf|цу|ке} все известные ему байки, старик внезапно вспоминает, кто перед ним, и давится так и не расказанной историей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "And some blokes say they saw a woman with horns in these woods..." {n}Despite his excitement at the rare opportunity to tell every tall tale he knows to a stranger he just met, the old man suddenly remembers who is standing before him and chokes on his unfinished story.{/n}
traits.speaker: OldMan

traits.locale_text: "And some blokes say they saw a woman with horns in these woods..." {n}Despite his excitement at the rare opportunity to tell every tall tale he knows to a stranger he just met, the old man suddenly remembers who is standing before him and chokes on his unfinished story.{/n}
traits.speaker: OldMan

traits.locale_text: "And some blokes say they saw a woman with horns in these woods—" {n}Despite his excitement at the rare opportunity to tell every possible tall tale he knows to a stranger, the old man suddenly remembers who is standing before him and chokes on his unfinished story.{/n}
traits.speaker: OldMan

traits.locale_text: "And some blokes say they saw a woman with horns in these woods—" {n}Despite his excitement at the rare opportunity to tell every possible tall tale he knows to a stranger, the old man suddenly remembers who is standing before him and chokes on his unfinished story.{/n}
traits.speaker: OldMan

traits.locale_text: "And some blokes say they saw a woman with horns in these woods—" {n}Despite his excitement at the rare opportunity to tell every possible tall tale he knows to a stranger, the old man suddenly remembers who is standing before him and chokes on his unfinished story.{/n}
traits.speaker: OldMan

traits.locale_text: "And some blokes say they saw a woman with horns in these woods—" {n}Despite his excitement at the rare opportunity to tell every possible tall tale he knows to a stranger, the old man suddenly remembers who is standing before him and chokes on his unfinished story.{/n}
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: “还有人说，他们在树林里看见了长着角的女人——”{n}尽管老人兴奋不已，难得有机会给陌生人讲述他听说过的故事，但他突然想起了面前的人是谁，于是连忙把没讲完的后半段故事噎了回去。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And some blokes say they saw a woman with horns in these woods—" {n}Despite his excitement at the rare opportunity to tell every possible tall tale he knows to a stranger, the old man suddenly remembers who is standing before him and chokes on his unfinished story.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “还有人说，他们在树林里看见了长着角的女人——”{n}尽管老人兴奋不已，难得有机会给陌生人讲述他听说过的故事，但他突然想起了面前的人是谁，于是连忙把没讲完的后半段故事噎了回去。{/n}
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: 「角の生えた女を森で目撃したと言い張る奴らもいるーー」{n}老人は自分が知っている伝説を他人に話せるという特別な機会に、ワクワクしていた。だが、目の前にいる人物の存在を突然思い出し、言葉を飲み込んだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And some blokes say they saw a woman with horns in these woods—" {n}Despite his excitement at the rare opportunity to tell every possible tall tale he knows to a stranger, the old man suddenly remembers who is standing before him and chokes on his unfinished story.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「角の生えた女を森で目撃したと言い張る奴らもいるーー」{n}老人は自分が知っている伝説を他人に話せるという特別な機会に、ワクワクしていた。だが、目の前にいる人物の存在を突然思い出し、言葉を飲み込んだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: «Y luego hay gente que dice que ha visto a una mujer con cuernos en el bosque...». {n}A pesar de la emoción que despierta en él la ocasión de contar todas las historias que conoce a {mf|un desconocido|una desconocida}, el anciano recuerda con quién está hablando y se le atraganta la historia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And some blokes say they saw a woman with horns in these woods—" {n}Despite his excitement at the rare opportunity to tell every possible tall tale he knows to a stranger, the old man suddenly remembers who is standing before him and chokes on his unfinished story.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Y luego hay gente que dice que ha visto a una mujer con cuernos en el bosque...». {n}A pesar de la emoción que despierta en él la ocasión de contar todas las historias que conoce a {mf|un desconocido|una desconocida}, el anciano recuerda con quién está hablando y se le atraganta la historia.{/n}
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: "Und ein paar Typen sagen, sie haben hier im Wald eine Frau mit Hörnern gesehen -"{n} Obwohl der Alte ganz aufgeregt ist, dass er die seltene Gelegenheit bekommt, {mf|einem|einer} Fremden alle Geschichten zu erzählen, die er kennt, fällt ihm plötzlich wieder ein, wer da vor ihm steht. Er verschluckt sich an seiner angefangenen Geschichte.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And some blokes say they saw a woman with horns in these woods—" {n}Despite his excitement at the rare opportunity to tell every possible tall tale he knows to a stranger, the old man suddenly remembers who is standing before him and chokes on his unfinished story.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Und ein paar Typen sagen, sie haben hier im Wald eine Frau mit Hörnern gesehen -"{n} Obwohl der Alte ganz aufgeregt ist, dass er die seltene Gelegenheit bekommt, {mf|einem|einer} Fremden alle Geschichten zu erzählen, die er kennt, fällt ihm plötzlich wieder ein, wer da vor ihm steht. Er verschluckt sich an seiner angefangenen Geschichte.{/n}
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: « Y a même des gars qui disent y avoir vu une femme avec des cornes... » {n}Malgré son excitation à l'idée de pouvoir raconter tous les ragots qu'il a pu entendre, le vieillard semble soudainement se rappeler qui se tient devant lui et s'interrompt en toussotant.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And some blokes say they saw a woman with horns in these woods—" {n}Despite his excitement at the rare opportunity to tell every possible tall tale he knows to a stranger, the old man suddenly remembers who is standing before him and chokes on his unfinished story.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Y a même des gars qui disent y avoir vu une femme avec des cornes... » {n}Malgré son excitation à l'idée de pouvoir raconter tous les ragots qu'il a pu entendre, le vieillard semble soudainement se rappeler qui se tient devant lui et s'interrompt en toussotant.{/n}
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: "Bir de bu ormanda gezen, boynuzlu bir kadın mı ne varmış..." {n}Bildiği her dedikoduyu bir yabancıya anlatmanın heyecanına kapılan ihtiyar, bir anda karşısındakinin kim olduğunu anımsayıp duraklıyor. Hikâyesini yarım bırakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And some blokes say they saw a woman with horns in these woods—" {n}Despite his excitement at the rare opportunity to tell every possible tall tale he knows to a stranger, the old man suddenly remembers who is standing before him and chokes on his unfinished story.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bir de bu ormanda gezen, boynuzlu bir kadın mı ne varmış..." {n}Bildiği her dedikoduyu bir yabacıya anlatmanın heyecanına kapılan ihtiyar, bir anda karşısındakinin kim olduğunu anımsayıp duraklıyor. Hikâyesini yarım bırakıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: OldMan
